VERSION 1.0 + CHALLENGES UPDATE is here! Take on 200+ challenges across 100+ levels and put your word skills to the test!

Challenge your mind with Wordomi, an innovative puzzle game combining the essence of Wordle and crossword puzzles. Navigate through 100+ levels, each designed to test your vocabulary and problem-solving skills in a mixed reality environment.

ENDLESS GAMEPLAY
